title: Centre notifies NaBFID as a public financial institution
description: The government has designated the National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development (NaBFID) as a public financial institution under the Companies Act. This move aims to strengthen infrastructure finance in India. Established in 2021, NaBFID focuses on addressing gaps in long-term infrastructure finance and developing bonds and derivatives markets to boost the economy.
